p: Almost all of applied PDSs caused the increases in Ca content in aboveground parts of plants. The adverse effect of Ca towards the developmental parameters of the second and third generation of aphids was also shown by multiple regressions. This element used for liming the soil brought about changes in aphid populations depending on the dose applied, with the higher dose (determined in line with 1.5 hydrolytic acidity) limiting the development of the Aphis fabae Scop. aphid population on faba bean (Sądej and Sądej 2001).
